price: Sesungguhnya Kami telah mengutus Nūḥ kepada kaumnya, lalu ia berkata, "Wahai kaumku sembahlah Allah, sekali-kali tak ada Tuhan bagimu selain-Nya".  Sesungguhnya (kalau kamu tidak menyembah Allah), aku takut kamu akan ditimpa azab hari yang besar (kiamat).
arabic: لَقَدۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا نُوحًا إِلَىٰ قَوۡمِهِۦ فَقَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ ٱعۡبُدُواْ ٱللَّهَ مَا لَكُم مِّنۡ إِلَٰهٍ غَيۡرُهُۥٓ إِنِّيٓ أَخَافُ عَلَيۡكُمۡ عَذَابَ يَوۡمٍ عَظِيمٖ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: laqad arsalnā nūḥan ilā qawmihi faqāla yāqawmi uʿ'budū al-laha mā lakum min ilāhin ghayruhu innī akhāfu ʿalaykum ʿadhāba yawmin ʿaẓīmin
